item.title: 泰瑟枪制造商阿克森企业因关税问题利润不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周二，泰瑟枪制造商阿克森企业第三季度利润不及分析师预期，受关税实施导致成本上升的压力影响，其股价在盘后交易中暴跌20%。【原文：Taser-maker Axon Enterprise missed analysts' estimate for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, pressured by higher costs resulting from the implementation of tariffs, sending its shares slumping 20% in extended trading.】

item.title: Entergy 与 Energy Transfer 签署长期天然气运输协议
item.description: 公用事业公司 Entergy 旗下部门与管道公司 Energy Transfer 周二表示，双方已签署一项为期 20 年的协议，向北路易斯安那州输送天然气。【原文：Utility Entergy's unit and pipeline firm Energy Transfer have signed a 20-year agreement to deliver natural gas to North Louisiana, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通回应关于公平使用银行服务的要求
item.description: 摩根大通在周二提交的一份监管文件中表示，它正在回应政府当局和其他各方就该银行有关所有美国人公平获得银行服务的政策和流程提出的要求。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said in a regulatory filing on Tuesday that it was responding to requests from government authorities and other parties regarding the bank's policies and processes related to fair access to banking to all Americans.】

item.title: 红杉资本首席执行官博塔卸任
item.description: Roelof Botha 在红杉资本任职三年多一点后，将辞去管理合伙人一职。【原文：Roelof Botha will step down as the managing partner at Sequoia Capital after a little more than three years in the role.】

item.title: 连锁餐厅卡瓦再次下调销售预期，原因是年轻食客减少
item.description: 地中海连锁餐厅卡瓦集团（Cava Group）周二今年第二次下调了年度同店销售增长预期，表明外出就餐需求疲软，尤其是低收入和年轻顾客的需求。【原文：Mediterranean restaurant chain Cava Group cut annual same-store sales growth forecast for the second time this year on Tuesday, signaling softer dining-out demand, especially from lower-income and younger customers.】

item.title: AMD 预计第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）周二预计第四季度营收将高于市场预期，该公司押注数据中心基础设施数十亿美元的扩张将促进对其人工智能芯片的需求。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices forecast fourth-quarter revenue above market estimates on Tuesday, betting on the multibillion-dollar expansions of data center infrastructure to boost demand for its artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 保险公司 AIG 第三季度利润因承保能力增强而上升
item.description: 美国国际集团周二报告称，该公司第三季度利润增长，原因是承保业务的强劲收益抵消了投资收入的下降。【原文：American International Group reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as the insurer was helped by strong gains from underwriting that offset a drop in income from investments.】

item.title: 凯德利尔第二季度收入因合同重新谈判而下降
item.description: Kyndryl 控股公司周二公布的第二季度收入略有下降，原因是该公司的前身 IBM 部门正在努力减少和重新谈判影响利润率的继承合同。【原文：Kyndryl Holdings reported a slight drop in second-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as the former IBM unit works to reduce and renegotiate inherited contracts that have hampered margins.】

item.title: 粉丝需求强劲，Live Nation 第三季度收入增加
item.description: 本周二，Ticketmaster 的母公司 Live Nation 公布第三季度收入增长，主要得益于音乐会和节庆活动的需求。【原文：Ticketmaster-parent Live Nation reported a rise in third-quarter revenue on Tuesday, helped by demand for concerts and festivals.】

item.title: 由于支付方持续下滑，Match 集团预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 本周二，Match Group 预计第四季度营收低于分析师预期，这凸显了其扭亏为盈工作面临的持续挑战，因为 Tinder 母公司正努力将休闲刷卡者转化为忠实的付费用户。【原文：Match Group forecast fourth-quarter revenue below analysts' estimates on Tuesday, underscoring ongoing challenges in its turnaround efforts as the Tinder parent struggles to convert casual swipers into loyal, paying users.】

item.title: 超微因交货延迟未达季度预期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周二，超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）的季度利润和营收未能达到华尔街预期，受大型人工智能交易交付时间表变动的影响，这家服务器制造商的股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 9%。【原文：Super Micro Computer missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit and revenue on Tuesday, hit by a shift in delivery schedules for large artificial intelligence deals, sending the server maker's shares down more than 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: Pinterest 营收预期疲软预示广告费用竞争激烈
item.description: 周二，Pinterest 预测第四季度营收略低于华尔街预期，预示着假日购物季期间来自 Meta 等大型平台的激烈竞争，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌约 16%。【原文：Pinterest forecast fourth-quarter revenue slightly below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, signaling fierce competition from larger platforms such as Meta during the holiday shopping season, sending its shares down around 16% in extended trading.】

item.title: 电动汽车激励政策到期前买家蜂拥而至，Rivian 收入超出预期
item.description: 本周二，Rivian Automotive 第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是美国消费者赶在联邦电动汽车税收优惠政策到期前购买电动汽车，从而推动了强劲的交付量。【原文：Rivian Automotive surpassed Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Tuesday, fueled by strong deliveries as U.S. consumers rushed to grab a federal tax incentive on electric vehicle purchases before its expiry.】

item.title: 安进公司利润超预期，年底将发布减肥数据
item.description: 安进公司周二公布的季度财务业绩超出华尔街预期，产品销售额增长了 12%，抵消了与试验性减肥药 MariTide 相关的运营支出增加和税率提高的影响。【原文：Amgen on Tuesday reported quarterly financial results that beat Wall Street expectations as product sales rose 12%, offsetting higher operating expenses related to experimental weight-loss drug MariTide and a higher tax rate.】

item.title: 波音工会称参议员敦促首席执行官奥特伯格真诚谈判
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会周二表示，参议院军事委员会的五名成员敦促波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）真诚谈判，与罢工成员达成公平协议。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers said on Tuesday that five members of the Senate Armed Services Committee urged Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg to negotiate in good faith and reach a fair agreement with the striking members.】

item.title: 白宫称英伟达不能向中国出售最先进的人工智能芯片
item.description: 白宫周二表示，特朗普政府目前不打算允许英伟达（Nvidia）向中国出售其最先进的人工智能芯片--"黑卫"（Blackwell）。【原文：The Trump administration is not planning to allow Nvidia to sell its most advanced AI chip, known as the Blackwell, to China right now, the White House said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Sejourne 表示，欧盟计划于 12 月发布公告，以提高小型电动汽车的价格
item.description: 欧盟一位委员周二表示，欧盟委员会的目标是在12月宣布建立一个新的经济型小型电动汽车类别，以应对中国的竞争并重振欧洲市场。【原文：The European Commission aims to announce the creation of a new category of affordable small electric cars in December in an effort to counter Chinese competition and revive the European market, an EU commissioner said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 星巴克押宝本地专业技术，有助于在中国市场重振雄风
item.description: 星巴克周一决定将其中国业务最多 60% 的股份出售给本地私募股权公司博裕资本，这将有助于这个处境艰难的品牌在全球增长最快的咖啡市场之一重新站稳脚跟。【原文：Starbucks' decision on Monday to sell up to 60% of its China business to local private equity firm Boyu Capital could help the hard-pressed brand regain ground in one of the world’s fastest-growing coffee markets.】

item.title: 美国银行业监管机构称合并 "有价值"，承诺快速审查
item.description: 一位美国最高银行监管机构负责人周二表示，该机构致力于及时审查潜在的银行兼并，并补充说此类交易可能对金融体系 "相当有价值"。【原文：A top U.S. bank regulator said Tuesday that his agency is committed to promptly reviewing potential bank mergers, adding that such deals could be "quite valuable" to the financial system.】

item.title: 百胜餐饮集团考虑出售必胜客，塔可钟带动第三季度业绩增长
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团（Yum Brands）周二表示，正在为在竞争激烈的快餐业中苦苦挣扎的必胜客连锁店探索战略选择，并公布了因塔可钟（Taco Bell）美国门店的需求而喜人的季度业绩。【原文：Yum Brands said on Tuesday it was exploring strategic options for its Pizza Hut chain struggling in a highly competitive fast-food industry, and posted upbeat quarterly results on the back of demand at its Taco Bell U.S. stores.】

item.title: Perplexity 因代理人工智能购物工具受到亚马逊的法律威胁
item.description: Perplexity AI 公司周二表示，它已收到亚马逊公司的法律威胁，要求这家初创公司阻止其 Comet 浏览器上的人工智能代理代表用户在这家电子商务巨头的平台上购物。【原文：Perplexity AI said on Tuesday it has received a legal threat from Amazon.com demanding that the startup block the AI agent on its Comet browser from shopping on the e-commerce giant's platform on a user's behalf.】

item.title: 贝塔技术公司估值 74 亿美元，纽交所首秀股价平开
item.description: 电动飞机制造商贝塔科技公司（Beta Technologies）周二在纽约证券交易所首次上市时股价平开，估值为 74.4 亿美元，表明投资者对美国政府长期停摆持谨慎态度。【原文：Electric aircraft maker Beta Technologies was valued at $7.44 billion after its shares opened flat in their New York Stock Exchange debut on Tuesday, signaling investor caution over a prolonged U.S. government shutdown.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，IBM 将裁员数千人，专注于软件发展
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，IBM 将在本季度裁员数千人，同时继续将业务重心转向高增长的软件和服务。【原文：IBM will cut thousands of roles this quarter while it continues to shift the focus of its business to higher-growth software and services, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街为纽约市市长投票做好准备，州长竞选让人看到中期选举的可能性
item.description: 本周二将举行纽约市市长选举，华尔街人心惶惶，如果佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）可能获胜，必将在全球资本主义的心脏地带引起反响，金融家们担心纽约市的持久竞争力和吸引力。【原文：Wall Street is on edge heading into the New York City mayoral election on Tuesday, with a potential victory for Zohran Mamdani set to reverberate through the heart of global capitalism, where financiers worry about the city's lasting competitiveness and appeal.】

item.title: 联合利华预计在 12 月 6 日前完成 Magnum 冰淇淋的分拆工作
item.description: 消费品集团联合利华（Unilever）周二表示，在因美国政府停摆而推迟分拆后，预计将在 12 月 6 日前完成分拆旗下 Magnum 冰淇淋部门的工作。【原文：Consumer goods group Unilever said on Tuesday it expects to complete the spin-off of its Magnum Ice Cream unit, after a delay because of the U.S. government shutdown, by December 6.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，阿波罗撤回以每股 64 美元的价格将比萨连锁店 Papa John's 私有化的申请
item.description: 据两位熟悉该交易的人士透露，阿波罗全球公司（Apollo Global）已经撤回了以每股 64 美元的价格将披萨连锁店 Papa John's 私有化的提议，因为华尔街正在等待周四发布的一份预计会很难看的财报。【原文：Apollo Global has withdrawn its offer to take pizza chain Papa John’s private at $64 a share, according to two people familiar with the deal, as Wall Street waits to see what is expected to be a tough earnings report on Thursday.】

item.title: 法国法院调查 TikTok 推动自杀的算法
item.description: 法国司法当局周二表示，他们已对中国社交媒体平台 TikTok 及其算法可能导致年轻人自杀的风险展开调查。【原文：French judicial authorities said on Tuesday they had opened an investigation into Chinese social media platform TikTok and the risks of its algorithms pushing young people into suicide.】

item.title: Meta 拒绝接受法国权利监督机构对算法的裁决
item.description: Meta Platforms 周二拒绝了法国权利监督机构针对其社交网络 Facebook 上歧视性招聘广告的算法做出的裁决。【原文：Meta Platforms on Tuesday rejected a ruling by the French rights watchdog against its algorithm after allegations of discriminatory job advertisements on its social network Facebook.】

item.title: 美国航空公司裁减部分管理人员和辅助人员职位
item.description: 美国航空公司周二表示，作为员工队伍调整的一部分，该公司将裁撤少量管理和辅助人员职位。【原文：American Airlines said on Tuesday it was eliminating a small number of management and support staff positions as part of a workforce adjustment.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司将推出经济型 Mac，进军低成本笔记本电脑市场
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，苹果公司准备在明年上半年推出一款经济型 Mac，首次进入低成本笔记本电脑市场。【原文：Apple is preparing to launch a budget Mac in the first half of next year, entering the low-cost laptop market for the first time, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】
